name: schema-automator
description: This is the Docker container for https://github.com/linkml/schema-automator
full_description:
This is the Docker container for https://github.com/linkml/schema-automator

To start a shell:

```
docker run  -v $PWD:/work -w /work -ti linkml/schema-automator
```

Then try some commands:

```
schemauto --help
```

This container also install the core linkml library, so this effectively extends https://hub.docker.com/u/linkml/linkml
